isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - USING ACOM FOR WINDOWS SOFTWARE - ACOM CONFIGURE MENU

svcprocinfo.para: The Configure menu offers two selections ( Figure 27):

svcsubproc.title: View ABS Controller Configuration Selection
svcsubproc.para: Selecting "View ABS Controller Configuration" will allow the user to view the configuration of the ABS system on the vehicle. Note that 3 tabs along the bottom of the box present various pieces of infor mation regarding the system. The tabs are:

No selections or choices are required or allowed by ACom under these tabs. The information presented is obtained by ACom though its communication with the ABS controller. This is an informational screen only ( Figure 28).

svcsubproc.title: Self Configure ABS Controller Selection
svcsubproc.para: The second choice under the Configure menu is "Self Configure ABS Controller."

important.para: This menu selection should only be made when it is necessary to configure or re-configure the ABS controller. As an example, this function would be used when replacing a malfunctioning controller with a new controller.

specpara.para: Choosing "Self Configure ABS Controller" will immediately initiate the self configure process. The process requires approximately 15 seconds. During this time the ABS system is "interrogated" to determine what equipment and features are present in the system. At the end of the process the controller "remembers" the information gathered during the process. This is the information displayed under the "View ABS Controller Configuration" (Step 1).
